Experience safer driving as your eyes won’t have to readjust from a bright screen to a dimly lit road. Our Night Mode turns on automatically in the dark to limit the strain on your eyes caused by night driving. Available for Premium members.

This update contains 2 independent versions. One of them we called it the new UI version.

It will be distributed to our users in batches.

Please share your suggestions with us when you are selected for the new UI version.

New stuffs for both 2 versions:

Parking Prediction has been added as a membership feature.

Users can update the status of a parking lot through the new Gauge pop-up.

Some other improvements.


New stuffs for the new UI version:

Brand new map interface.

Discovery: Filter your desired POI by promotions, distance and facilities.

Routing: New design for routing process.

Service: It contains all the current third party services and the membership purchase entrance.

Personal page: Avatar supportive.
User’s contribution system.
New personal information edit page.

What's new:
1. New login system.
2. Mutually exclusive access system - users can only remain logged in on a single device.
3. Update notification popup.
4. POI icons optimization.
5. "P" label on the top right corner of Weigh Station POI icons which indicate PrePass supportive.

Elegant new interface!
Our designers work hard to stay up to date with the latest and best App designs so we can provide you an elegant & intuitive interface. Check out Trucker Path’s new bottom navigation bar.
 
Who do you love?
No, Trucker Path isn’t becoming a dating app! We’ve made it easier to add POI reviews & have added a new feature that allows you to help other truckers by giving your favorite reviews a Thumbs Up. Gotta love that!
 
By Truckers, For Truckers!
We are constantly developing the new features you request to help make life on the road a little more comfortable. Please keep your suggestions coming in so we can continue to improve the only App that’s designed by truckers for truckers.

Ask and you shall receive! Trucker Path is happy to share several new features & enhancements. 
What’s New?
•Improved the bottom bar for a better experience.
•Fixed the incorrect distances that occasionally pop up.
•Now easily copy POI addresses for easy reference.
•Coming Soon! The Trucker Path Community where you can post, comment, laugh and even buy & sell used trucks.
Keep sharing your feedback, suggestions & reviews and help keep Trucker Path the only app  built by Truckers for Truckers!

Stay connected with your fellow truckers with our "FOLLOW" button. With this function, you can keep close with your buddies and freely chat with them.

1. New POI – the Docks feature is now live! Easily predict time spent on loading, unloading and waiting at destinations.
2. Can't be bothered to register for Truckerpath? No problem, now you can easily log in with Facebook or Google.
3. We've made estimated time of arrival more accurate!
4. Now you can upload photos with your POI review.
5. Create your Driver profile for more jobs opportunities
6. See Trucks and Trailers for sale on our new Used Equipment section.

•We updated the algorithm used to calculate distance. This will ensure the distance between you and the POI you are looking to get to is more accurate.
•Create your own specialized nickname for added privacy.
•We now support simultaneous logins. You can login to your Trucker Path account on your phone and tablet at the same time.

1.With the offline map feature, you can use navigation without network or with poor network conditions to make your journey safe. Become a Gold member and enjoy it now!
2.You can now switch between multiple devices and use the navigation feature in tablet devices with GPS capabilities.
3.You can now trump your video length and add a cover function within the video album feature in Trucker Path Forum.
4.We have also made upgraded the system to allow for a smoother experience.

•You can now save your routing information allowing you to switch between pages and even close the application without losing what you have put in.
•Every minute counts when on the clock. Trucker Path has streamlined the process for getting your truck optimized route!
•Looking to renew your Trucker Path membership or get on board with Trucker Path? We have made the process easier than ever!
Keep sharing your feedback, suggestions &reviews and help keep Trucker Path the only app built by Truckers for Truckers!

2. Can't be bothered to register for Truckerpath? No problem, now you can easily log in with Facebook or Google.
3. We've made estimated time of arrival more accurate!
4. Now you can upload photos with your POI review.
5. Create your Driver profile for more jobs opportunities
6. See Trucks and Trailers for sale on our new Used Equipment section.

•We updated the algorithm used to calculate distance. This will ensure the distance between you and the POI you are looking to get to is more accurate.
•Create your own specialized nickname for added privacy.
•We now support simultaneous logins. You can login to your Trucker Path account on your phone and tablet at the same time.

1.With the offline map feature, you can use navigation without network or with poor network conditions to make your journey safe. Become a Gold member and enjoy it now!
2.You can now switch between multiple devices and use the navigation feature in tablet devices with GPS capabilities.
3.You can now trump your video length and add a cover function within the video album feature in Trucker Path Forum.
4.We have also made upgraded the system to allow for a smoother experience.

•You can now save your routing information allowing you to switch between pages and even close the application without losing what you have put in.
•Every minute counts when on the clock. Trucker Path has streamlined the process for getting your truck optimized route!
•Looking to renew your Trucker Path membership or get on board with Trucker Path? We have made the process easier than ever!
Keep sharing your feedback, suggestions &reviews and help keep Trucker Path the only app built by Truckers for Truckers!

The NEW “Nearby” channel is location based and allows you to know what's happening with truckers around you.

BTW, we bet you will like the new forum.
